features: KERATIN SMOOTH SYSTEM: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo for dry hair, with Lamellar-Discipline, transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours
PRO STYLE TECHNOLOGY: Formulated with amino acids and ceramide, this keratin conditioner's tech makes hair 2x stronger and more manageable* with continuous use; *versus a non-conditioning shampoo
ULTIMATE 72 HOUR SLEEK LOOK: This smoothing shampoo for unruly hair delivers transformative smoothing benefits, so you can forget the frizz and indulge in gorgeously silky hair for up to 72 hours
TRUSTED INGREDIENTS: This TRESemmé hair shampoo, 28oz, is PETA-certified cruelty-free and is free from Parabens, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin
HAIR CARE TIPS FROM OUR STYLISTS: Start with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo and follow with this hair repair conditioner to leave hair strong, manageable and healthy-looking
MORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE: With this shampoo, you can enjoy more of the salon-quality formula you love, now in a bigger 28oz bottle
body.description: Don’t let unruly frizz ruin your style. There’s something about silky hair that’s full of natural movement that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to go to a salon with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo. This moisturizing shampoo for dry hair is designed with Lamellar-Discipline technology for smooth, sleek, frizz-defying hair for up to 72 hours. Formulated with amino acids and ceramide, this salon-level Pro Style Technology makes hair 2x stronger, 2x more manageable, and resistant from breakage (vs. a non-conditioning shampoo). Make your hair the perfect style canvas with this keratin smoothing shampoo hair treatment. How to use: Step 1: Apply the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo to wet hair, gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather, and rinse. Step 2: After shampooing, lightly squeeze the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. This TRESemmé Shampoo is free from Parabens, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. Get salon-quality results in every wash. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with the right wash and care foundation. TRESemmé Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable*. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. *with continued use.

ULTIMATE FRIZZ CONTROL Our Keratin Smooth System, with Lamellar-Dsicipline, transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create and style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA-approved cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. PROFESSIONAL, SALON QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemmé is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want.

TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Conditioner, 28 oz Main Benefit Looking for smooth, sleek strands? Our Keratin Smooth System, with Lamellar-Discipline, transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours. Say hello to 48 hours of frizz control and shine with the TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Collection. Made with Argan Oleo Blend, this shampoo, when paired with its conditioner Tame frizz and boost your hair´s shine for 48 hours with the TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Collection. Made with Argan Oleo Blend, this conditioner pairs with its shampoo to intensely moisture

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shampoo unfortunate that tops weren’t secured
reviews.reviewText: I like this shampoo but two bottles leaked into the packaging. Not worth returning them but whoever packs them might check the tops first.

reviews.reviewText: The only shampoo I will ever use! I have thin hair. This shampoo makes my hair look healthier and fuller!!!
